scripts.dev-backend: docker-compose up -d db && cd backend && yarn start
scripts.install-deps: concurrently "cd backend && yarn install" "cd frontend && yarn install"
scripts.build: yarn install-deps && cd frontend && yarn build && cp -a build/. ../backend/public/
scripts.start: yarn build && cd backend && yarn start
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && yarn test" "cd frontend && yarn test"
